episodes.title: Cults, Taboos and Twisted Faith: Inside the Cult - Britain’s Hidden Survivors | A True Story
episodes.description:
Behind closed doors across the UK, a dark and often invisible world thrives—one of coercion, abuse, and absolute control. From notorious organisations like the Children of God to modern spiritual manipulators masquerading as healers, cults have left thousands of lives shattered. Through harrowing survivor testimony and expert insight, this unflinching documentary explores the psychological grip of cults, the unspeakable trauma many endured from childhood, and the long road to reclaiming identity and freedom. A haunting, deeply human look at Britain’s forgotten victims—and their extraordinary resilience.

#atruestory
